channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Outlining the Challenges to U.S. Naval Shipbuilding
item.description: The U.S. naval shipbuilding enterprise struggles to produce ships at the scale and speed demanded despite being a bipartisan priority for successive administrations and Congress. The White House must tackle complex, longstanding challenges to improve shipbuilding capacity.

item.title: The United States Needs a Southwest Drone Wall
item.description: CSIS Americas associate fellow Henry Ziemer argues the United States needs to do more to secure the southwest land border against illicit drones.
